title.rendered: “IDF and Shin Bet’s Overnight Crackdown on Hamas: Operations, Arrests, and Demolitions Detailed”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Last night, IDF and Shin Bet troops operated against the Hamas terror organization throughout the Central Command

In the village of Rumana in the Menashe Brigade, forces demolished the house of the terrorist who carried out the shooting attack in Tel Aviv in which Staff Sergeant Chen Amir was murdered. In a joint operation by the IDF and Shin Bet overnight, during an arrest, an armed terrorist was killed who had recruited a military squad and carried out several shooting attacks.

In a joint operation by the IDF, Shin Bet, and the Border Police, ten wanted men were arrested throughout Judea and Samaria and the Jordan Valley and the Valleys Brigade, two of them terrorists in the Hamas terrorist organization.

During the night, IDF and Border Police engineering forces operated in the village of Rumana in the Menashe Brigade and demolished the house of the terrorist Kamal Abu Bakar who carried out the shooting attack in Tel Aviv on 5.8.23, in which member of the urban reconnaissance team Chen Amir was murdered.

Also, during operations in the city of Jericho in the Jordan Valley and the Valleys Brigade and on the basis of precise intelligence information from the Shin Bet, during an operation to arrest him, Mohammed Hanawi, an armed terrorist affiliated with the Islamic Jihad organization was killed. Hanawi recruited a military squad and carried out several shooting attacks against IDF forces in recent months. In Hanawi’s vehicle, an M16 type weapon, magazines, ammunition, and military equipment were found. In the city of Hebron, a wanted man who had previously thrown stones at citizens in the settlement of Kiryat Arba was arrested.

In the village of Kfar Qalil in Samaria, the fighters located a blueprint for the production of weapons and weapon parts. In addition, undercover personnel from the Border Police Judea and Samaria (magav YO”SH), under the direction of Shin Bet, arrested a squad of terrorists in the casbah of Nablus, members of a military squad that had shot at security forces several times during various operations.

Since the beginning of the war, over 1,950 wanted persons have been arrested throughout Judea and Samaria Brigade and the Jordan Valley and the Valleys Brigade, about 1,100 of them are affiliated with the Hamas terror organization.
